title: Rise in noise complaints threatens late-night sector - MorningAdvertiser.co.uk
summary: The article discusses the rise in noise complaints faced by music venues since the pandemic, highlighting the impact on businesses and the community as well as efforts to address the issue through communication and cooperation.
green_innovation: FALSE, The article primarily focuses on noise complaints faced by music venues and does not directly involve innovations contributing to environmental sustainability goals.

title: Noise abatement notice advice for pubs - MorningAdvertiser.co.uk
summary: The article discusses noise concerns from events at a village pub, advising on steps to address the issue to prevent disruptions to nearby residents and potential legal actions.
